Chastisement

spell id [id]: 84
effect number [effect_number]: 28
damage [damage]: 999
spec [spec]: 4240
casting time [casttime]: 100%
area of effect [aoe_s]: Caster
number of effects [nreff]: 1
Enslave:lose commander status
 
(Affects Magic Beings Only [magiconly], Armor Negating [armornegating], Magic Resistance Negates [mrnegates])
The mage invokes the laws of the Celestial Bureaucracy and chastises a magical being for serving a false god. The target is wounded, regardless of armor and magic resistance and is compelled to switch sides. Powerful beings often disregard the compulsion.
